title: Supporting social-emotional development through relationship
content:
Scenario: Supporting social-emotional development through relationship
    Given Margaret provides emotional support and relationship security
    And grandchildren develop social-emotional skills through secure attachment
    When the educational_elohim tracks developmental care
    Then it should recognize social-emotional teaching as education
    And it should value relationship as foundation for learning
    And it should track emotional development and regulation skills
    And social-emotional care should accumulate care tokens
    And Margaret's emotional support should be recognized as developmental work
    And relationship-based learning should be valued as essential education
